Title: P.S. I Love You
Overview: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.
Tagline: His life ended. Now, a new one will begin.
Keywords: job-hopping, irland, shoe seller, letter, dying and death, loss of husband
production_companies: Wendy Finerman Productions, Alcon Entertainment, Grosvenor Park Productions
Cast: Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler, Lisa Kudrow
